Text: RE NABA Techical Speaking Sessions Cc Hello Sally I have been out of the office so I am sorry for the late reply I called NABA and they have filled all of their technical sessions for the conference However when we participate next year we will make sure to get you slotted in a session early The four free conference passes includes Wes Colwells group We can purchase additional conference passes if you would like to send more employees Thank you for you involvement Meliza Evanson From Sally nronXgate on PM To Meliza ES cc Hector nronXgate Frank De nronXgate Patti nronXgate Subject RE NABA Techical Speaking Sessions My first and second choices on speaking engagements are listed below st choice MG Wed July Who Moved My Cheese nd choice MG Fri July Leading Your Firm Through Change Frank and Hector have been on point for further participation in the conference and would be best to visit with about use of other passes to the conference Wes Colwell has cosponsored our involvement in this conference Are the four passes intended to cover his group too Sally Original Message From Evanson Meliza Sent Tuesday May AM To Beck Sally Cc De Jesus Frank McLoughlin Hector Kerr Vanessa Yowman Andrea Olson Cindy McClure Zakiyyah McDaniel Kirk Marshall Karen Subject NABA Techical Speaking Sessions Hello Sally This email is to confirm the message I left for you earlier this morning I have attached the speaking sessions below Please let me know as soon as possible the session that you would be interested in conducting for the NABA Conference Also two of your employees are interested in participating at the conference Mark McClure and Errol McLauglin You have a total of four conferences passes to utilize for your group Please let me know if you would like them to attend for career development purposes They are both willing to recruit at the conference NABA is expecting over professional participants this year Thank you for your support for the organization This will be a wonderful new partnership for Enron and your organization Please call me if you have any questions Meliza Evason Associate HR X File Courses NABAdoc

NABA Techical Speaking Sessions Cc Hello Sally This email is to confirm the message I left for you earlier this morning I have attached the speaking sessions below Please let me know as soon as possible the session that you would be interested in conducting for the NABA Conference Also two of your employees are interested in participating at the conference Mark McClure and Errol McLauglin You have a total of four conferences passes to utilize for your group Please let me know if you would like them to attend for career development purposes They are both willing to recruit at the conference NABA is expecting over professional participants this year Thank you for your support for the organization This will be a wonderful new partnership for Enron and your organization Please call me if you have any questions Meliza Evason Associate HR X
weirdoHey you I have to show you this because its one of the strangest ones I have ever attracted in a long time I dont think we had the same conversation on Friday

FW Spread the wordPST FYI Original Message From Gelin Elberg Sent Thursday November AM To Evanson Meliza Subject FW Spread the word Original Message From Shoaf Kimberly Sent Thursday November AM To Reese Jeanette C Hopley George Alston Cassandra Tellis Claude Gelin Elberg Bryce Samantha Yowman Andrea Sterling Jevaughn Cobb Jr John Brown Daniel Greenlee Debny Paige Barbara Reese Mark Hudson LSheryl Frazier Lamar Davis Tracy Poulson Marc Franklin II Clifton Schaffer Brian Adams Erica Samuel Brent Subject FW Spread the word Original Message From Hebert Tamika Sent Thursday November AM To Shoaf Kimberly McDaniel Kirk Kimble Stephanie Hamb Edward Hatch Tyrone Davis Natasha Alexander Kim D Tellis Claude Ross Derrick Mcclure Mark Wynne Rita Dillingham Geynille Bellard Lyelle Subject Spread the word After a very heartwreching week I think it is time everyone had the opportunity to relax a little bit from all the madness Therefore I am suggesting we meet up on Saturday around pm at Cabos downtown Please feel free to spread the word This way it can be a networking party of exchanging information and business cards Place Cabos Downtown Travis St Time pm Thanks Tamika Hebert Enron Net Works LLC Mailto Phone

RE Update Resume Cc PST he is working on updating it for you Here is his contact information Errol McLaughlin He knows your going to call him Original Message From Samantha Ray mailto Sent Thursday November AM To Evanson Meliza Subject Re Update Resume Did you get your friends resume for the UK job Sam Original Message From Evanson Meliza Meliza NRONcom To Sent Thursday November AM Subject Update Resume Hello Samantha Here is my resume I updated it this morning Thanks maeRESUMEdoc This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Requested HR Information Cc Hello Jim I work for Jeanie as a generalist She asked me to gather some information for you on your retirement options Here is some general information that you will need to know about when considering retirement Medical Coverage Options Savings Plan and Cash Balance Plan To obtain more information specifically about your individual retirement would have required me to disclosure your information to our benefits departement Since you requested this request to remain confidential I was only able to obtain general information for you If you do plan on retirement please notify us a month in advance Also if you want more information on your Medical Coverage Plan Options please contact Tony Jarrett at x If you want greater detail about your Savings Plan andor Cash Balance Plan please contact Carla Dobbs at X If you need any further assistance please feel free to call or email me I hope this helps Meliza Evanson x
